promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young special cat steel-type pokemon wearing ancient armor. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Desertuff, a a chibi young special cat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Raging Hammer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "steel" or "Desertuff". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, cat-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This kitten-like creature, known as Desertuff, utilizes its tough metallic fur as armor. It roams arid landscapes, using Raging Hammer to forage.
